The end result is that I have to keep an item of clothing that doesn't fit me because it didn't fit my daughter.
Why don't they give me a solution?

Last Saturday I bought 3 items at the Arkadia store. The next day, very early on Sunday, I went to request a size change of the boxers. Although I know that underwear items cannot be exchanged, I asked the store manager to consider my request. The boy's boxers literally fell off his waist. We made the mistake of wearing the same size pants, but at night when I tried the boxers on, they were not his size. The store manager took my information and told me that he would ask for authorization on Monday. He kept my information, but they didn't even call me to say No. I think the word is honored. I received a 25% bonus for my oldest daughter's birthday, which I was planning to redeem. When I got to the checkout, they told me that we had the birthday bonus in the system. I said yes, but to redeem it, I did not validate the discount value they had in the system since in theory it should be the same percentage as the one I received physically and by mail. To my surprise, when I left the store, I checked the invoice and they only discounted 20%. I returned to the store to have the invoice returned and reissued with the 25% discount, to which the ARKADIA Store officials told me that it was not possible, so we left very unhappy. They should have returned the purchase and invoiced again with the 25% discount, which was the one we received physically and by mail instead of the 20%.

Actually until today offcorss was my favorite brand but really today I was super dissatisfied with a purchase we made on September 2nd which was a pair of pants for my son's first communion, I took him to the Los Molinos store, he tried on size 12 and 14, we chose 12, on Thursday the 28th I measured his clothes and oh surprise the pants were size 10 obviously that didn't fit him, I immediately went to make the exchange and there was no same reference, the girl who helped me told me that in Viva I went there and that they didn't have it, then in El Tesoro, the truth is what a serious mistake and especially on a special occasion when you expect everything to go perfectly. Right away on Sunday, October 1, I went to make the exchange and what the people who serve me told me was that I had to exchange it for something from the store and that they couldn't give me a voucher, because the exchange time is up tomorrow, my God, how can you force people to buy something they don't need and especially because of a physical mistake on your part? I will be very attentive to the response because I will present the case to the Superintendency of Industry and Commerce, because I really feel that this is a violation of the rights of exchange. I don't understand why a voucher can't be generated because forcing someone to buy something at a time when it is not required, the truth is how disappointing üòï I just hope I don't have to live this experience again.

When I left the store, Mr. Yonatan Tapia made me feel like a thief, arguing that due to company policy, he had to review in detail the purchase I had made, to the point of questioning me why I had more clothes than those that appeared on the invoice, and taking out each item and inspecting it thoroughly. I told him to speak to the advisor and that it seemed very uncomfortable to me that he was questioning and reviewing everything the way he was doing with my purchase, and that he was not doing the same with the other customers who were leaving. It made me feel very bad, and then an advisor whose name I don't remember arrived and supported what her coworker was doing, and challenged me by saying that if I was dissatisfied with what they were doing, I should file a complaint. After that awkward moment, and when they told me I could leave, I told them I was going to complain, since I have always shopped at that store and they had never made me feel that way. I believe that a store, such a prestigious brand, cannot allow its employees to treat a customer like that, and in the end they were not able to apologize for the situation. I honestly will not shop there again and I will make sure that other people know about my anecdote if they do not take corrective action.
